Package ingameObjects

Class IngameObject

java.lang.Object
ingameObjects.IngameObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Character, Fruit, PowerUp, ScorePoint, Wall
public abstract class IngameObject extends Object implements Serializable
represents characters and static objects that are used games levels
